explains: adj. 下流的；不礼貌的；不得体的

sentences.en: He accused Mrs. Moore of making an indecent suggestion.
sentences.cn: 他指控穆尔太太做下流的性暗示。

sentences.en: The amendment prohibits obscene or indecent materials which denigrate the objects or beliefs of a particular religion.
sentences.cn: 该修正案禁止玷污某一宗教客体或信仰的色情或不雅物品。

sentences.en: That skirt of hers is positively indecent.
sentences.cn: 她的那条裙子太暴露了。
